data.text:
@gabrielladriver Good for you!
Take back your soul.
You are a dominion within yourself (legally) they can't force you to do anything!
Have a wonderful day .... on YOUR terms 😁
@gabrielladriver @ford_davidf I did indeed and it was spectacular!  Yours looks rather lovely too!  Was it good to be out and a wee bit normal again? Did you fall off the wagon?
@gabrielladriver Looks like an amazing place. That knife set!

@gabrielladriver The atlas bar in Singapore is top of my list 

https://t.co/GSzuJltrra
@XtinaHK My friend isn’t an oyster fan and we didn’t realise there would be quite so many so I did my best to get through them! 😂
@ford_davidf It is! It has been on my list for ages!

@22degn Ha! I’ve heard that and the fiasco brunch are fabulous! As for 7s, I went to the last one in 2019 and did a junk the night before the opening with a 4am LKF finish which meant I couldn’t drink for the first two days of 7s!! 😂🤦🏻‍♀️My Achilles is however Disco Brunch at La Vache TST!

@gabrielladriver Watch out for their Martini making masterclass on a Saturday afternoon. It’s the most lethal thing I’ve experienced for a long time. Imagine the 7s (remember that?!) but condensed in to 3 hours. 
I think we learned a lot. But none of know. And we don’t speak of it now.
